name: My Digital Shelf
content: Now in its sixth year, the Online & Digital Grocery Summit London 2020 will bring together the leading Online Grocery Retailers and FMCG/Grocery brands to understand the key actions to optimise your brand's eCommerce strategies and increase your online sales. The value of the online and digital grocery industry was £9.57bn (5% of overall grocery sales) in 2015 and this is set to almost double to £17.2bn (9% of overall grocery sales) by 2020\. So, don't miss the opportunity to learn from and network with the key grocery retailers, brands and industry experts and get your share of the online grocery industry's fastest growing sector! If you'd like to learn more about the 2020 UK Summit please contact sarah@mydigitalshelf.co.uk
